page.text: EXT. SUPER HERO HIGH SCHOOL FOUNTAIN - DAY
Wonder Woman is surrounded by a crowd of students as
PRINCIPAL WALLER hands her an AWARD SCROLL.
...it is my great honor to announce
Wonder Woman as Hero of the Month!
WHIP PAN TO... Wonder Woman's DORM ROOM. There is a PILE of
identical scrolls on her desk. WHIP PAN BACK.
- Teacher JUNE MOON proudly hands Wonder Woman back a test
paper with a prominent A+ on it! More applause.
- In MUSIC CLASS in the GYM, Wonder Woman finishes playing
- WW swinging her sword like she's in battle. WIDEN to see
she's hacking at a stone pillar, carving it into a STATUE OF
RED TORNADO. Classmates and teacher RED TORNADO are impressed
Thanks! This means so much to me!
There's more! As a special surprise
for our Hero of the Month, we've
Waller points up at the approaching BUMBLEBEE'S HELICOPTER!
BUMBLEBEE is piloting and HIPPOLYTA WAVES to WW below.
They HUNKER DOWN -- WW HOLDS HER HAIR to keep from flying off!
The copter lands and Bumblebee and Hippolyta get out.
Wonder Woman and her mom EMBRACE.
It's wonderful to see you, Mother!
After a soft and loving moment. Hippolyta backs off.
Queen Hippolyta, I'm so glad you
finally get to see your daughter
receive one of her many awards.
Hippolyta looks at the award scroll with disdain.
the awards are cast in bronze.
You know, my daughter won a full
But she chose to come... here.
ON Bumblebee whispering to Supergirl and Batgirl:
She complained the whole way here
about the size of my helicopter.
I'm sure she's only trying to be
Hippolyta's face pops in between them.
COMMISSIONER GORDON, in CSI mode, wears a lab coat and is
surrounded by beakers. He holds a Lego Tile with a
FINGERPRINT STICKER like a glass slide.
It's Queen Hippolyta. And we'd like
some menus and a table in back. Hop
The search for clues and evidence
required by law to prove guilt.
WW is doing fine, but then sees her mother STARING at her
from the audience and gets nervous.
Katana STRIKES. She's won this round! Wonder Woman SMILES.
Wonder Woman STANDS and finds Hippolyta next to her.
keen edge that you would lose to
In a demo game, Bumblebee, Batgirl, Supergirl and WW are
playing against FLASH, GREEN LANTERN, CYBORG and HARLEY! We
WW looks nervously at her mother on the sidelines. The match
begins and Harley dashes across the field with a citizen.
Wonder Woman used her lasso to rope Harley and steals the
Wonder Woman runs toward the net getting the citizen to
Yay, Wonder Woman! You tied it up!
Wonder Woman's SMILE soon FADES as she GLANCES at her
A citizen POPS OUT and WW, self-conscious and distracted,
Harley takes advantage and scoops up the Citizen.
She passes it to Cyborg. WW is frozen with indecision.
Were you left out in the rain,
WW fumes and MAKES A RUN for Cyborg, But she GETS HIT by a
THAT DOES IT. WW garners strength, pulls it together,
BYPASSES ONE LAST HAZARD and scores! THEY WIN!
Her teammates hoist her up and carry her in celebration.
ANGLE ON: Hippolyta is stoic. To Waller --
I see you teach histrionics here as
From her victory perch, WW sees Hippolyta stand up and leave.
Mother and daughter are the only ones not cheering.
In the empty class, Batgirl fixes her BATJET.
Suddenly, she HEARS A NOISE. She looks around for the source
and discovers WW HIDING in the Invisible Jet.
You know, if you're trying to avoid
your mom, an invisible jet might
not be the best hiding spot.
WW flies out of the jet. Lands by Batgirl.
How did you know I'm avoiding my
your mother. Want to talk about it?
Nothing I do is good enough. This
She wipes away the beginnings of a tear.
I thought she would see how happy
and successful I am and finally
understand why I need to be here.
So... I just took your mother to
corn. So we've got that in common!
Just as Wonder Woman is about to speak, Hippolyta enters.
There you are! Daughter, I want you
to know that I'm sorry things have
Yes! But fear not, everything is
fixed! I've called the Dean of
What!? Mother! No! This is my
I've got amazing friends and I'm
learning so much! This is where I
There is a LONG BEAT as Hippolyta takes this in.
begins at dawn. If I don't see you
there, I... don't expect I'll see
EXT. SUPER HERO HIGH SCHOOL - CONTINUOUS
Hippolyta exits and heads toward Bumblebee and her copter.
You there! I wish to leave
In the bushes, a PURPLE KRYPTOMITE w/ SWIRLY, HYPNOTIC EYES
appears. It FOLLOWS Hippolyta into the chopper unseen!
Back with Supergirl, Batgirl an emotionally spent WW.
It'll blow over. Give her some
time. And pie. Pie always works.
Suddenly, Batgirl hears a BEEP coming from the Batjet. She
It's a warning signal from the
It'll be good to set my mind to
Yeah, it's probably a bad idea...
You're right. We should stay put.
BEAT. Off the girls' determination to stay...
EXT. SUPER HERO HIGH SCHOOL - SAME
The Batjet begins to LIFT OFF with our heroes. As it slowly
Bumblebee is getting a good look at the Batjet and its
passengers as she prepares to take off for Themyscira.
What do you mean you're her lab
daughter is one of the most
why would she ever need a team?!
Bumblebee watches the Batjet disappear on the horizon and
narrows her eyes in deep thought.
The girls make it to Batgirl's awesome Batbunker!
Batgirl sits at the computer terminal and goes to work.
Hey, I'm sorry your mom doesn't
approve of us. Maybe if she just
hung out with us for a day...
Yeah, maybe... but not here. She
No, that's good! It's what keeps
the Earth spinning! But the energy
is building up in a few localized
with the natural flow of the
Supergirl and WW are both lost. Batgirl breaks it down:
She's in her element, focused and PRESSING BUTTONS.
DING! A RED DOT appears on the computer screen map/grid.
Got it! Looks like the source of
Aw, man! / No! / That place smells!
Only one thing to do. Hold your
The girls break into LENA's LAIR on the docks of Metropolis!
Lena has a MAKESHIFT LAB AREA set up inside.
Looks empty. And smells like feet.
The girls sneak around the spooky, darkened warehouse,
Supergirl, flying in the dark, turns back to say...
THUD! She just flew into SOMETHING...
Yes... or that big piece of
Batgirl indicates a piece of equipment. It says "S.T.A.R.
And i'm guessing those are stolen,
WIDEN to include A SECOND PIECE of equipment next to it,
exactly the same, this time "S.T.A.R. LABS GENERATOR" is
SCRATCHED OFF and now has "LEXCORP GENERATOR" childishly
Batgirl pushes a button on the device activating a HIDDEN
SCREEN that descends from under the catwalk. LEGO-ESQUE PLANS
Hey, take a look at this.
Batgirl studies the plans a moment, and --
Someone's tapping into a bunch of
Batgirl PULLS UP a GIANT final image: A Dimensional Gateway.
will be strong enough to generate
So Eclipso can get back to Gemworld
How do you know Eclipso's involved?
Batgirl POINTS to a SMALL IMAGE in the corner of the SCREEN.
She SWIPES it to GROW. We can now see a rendering that is
clearly ECLIPSO'S SIGNATURE along with her HEAD SHOT.
They look up to see LENA LUTHOR! She's pointing a PLASMA
BLASTER at them from a WALKWAY ABOVE.
once she's done using the Earth to
get home, it'll be all mine.
But the Earth can't shoulder this
Well, if I have to choose between a
that's all mine... and a mint
That's as crazy as a soup sandwich.
This coming from a girl wearing
Let me help you update your look!
Lena starts BLASTING! They DUCK and RUN for cover.
WW BRACELET DEFLECTS, SHATTERING lab equipment to PIECES!
Go easy on that stuff! It's stolen!
Supergirl DODGES BLASTS and Batgirl BATARANGS at Lena, making
WW LASSO's Lena's BLASTER out of her hands. Lena TUCKS and
Lena PULLS OUT a KRYPTONITE CONTROL TABLET. She PRESSES A
BUTTON, and out come a SWARM of GREEN KRYPTOMITES.
She uses her now-sputtering FREEZE BREATH to build a WALL OF
ICE, keeping the Kryptomites and Lena at bay. With the K-
mites blocked, we see her strength return.
Lena and her Kryptomites are on the other side of the ice
wall. Lena is SILENTLY SHOUTING at our heroes.
Batgirl pulls up data on Lena's DISPLAY PANEL.
What do all these places have in
The display also indicates a COUNTDOWN.
We're going to have to split up!
They each head out! Wonder Woman in the INVISIBLE JET,
Batgirl in the BATJET and Supergirl FLIES OFF!
The moon shines brightly as we PUSH IN to see ECLIPSO SITTING
UPON HER THRONE in the Dark Palace, sinister as ever. A
SCREEN pops open. Lena is on the other end of the call.
Eclipso, we've got problems. And it
It sounds like "your problem" not a
"my problem". So, deal with it! I
Don't worry, I'm on it. Don't you
love it when you can trust a
you want to rule the Earth? Good
luck! Once my real plan is put in
Wonder Woman LANDS the Invisible Jet in the desert sand.
Now on foot, WW LOOKS toward the trio of pyramids.
I wonder which one of the pyramids
ZOOM TO: The TIP of a HUGE PYRAMID. It's GLOWING unnaturally.
WW SQUINTS to see: OBJECTS coming toward her. YELLOW
KRYPTOMITES! WW hears the LOUD, DISEMBODIED VOICE of Lena.
It's coming from one Kryptomite -- A SPEAKER ON ITS HEAD.
Welcome Dunder Woman. Meet my new
Wonder Woman BACKS AWAY as the Yellow Kryptomites inch
Also, I'd love feedback on this
so feel free to fill out a comment
Wonder Woman GULPS as she sees the swarm CHARGE.
Batgirl's jet soars over the jungle.
She spots a GLOWING AZTEC MONUMENT out the window.
Or... just look out the window.
Batgirl walks up to the generator at the base of the pyramid.
Suddenly, out come a swarm of BLUE KRYPTOMITES!
Not yet, Brat-Girl... but you will
Batgirl backs away, WINCING WITH CONFUSION, as we...
Supergirl LANDS in a field. She sees a Druid astronomical
stone circle in the distance. It GLOWS.
Suddenly, a swarm of ORANGE KRYPTOMITES billows out from the
Lena! I had a sneaking suspicion--
--and you'll have a lot more once
The Yellow Kryptomites attack WW! She SHIELDS, DEFLECTS and
DODGES, trying to make her way to the pyramid.
One Kryptomite SNEAKS UP and TOUCHES HER LEG! Suddenly, she
is engulfed by a WAVE OF FEAR!
She tries to battle on, but she's suddenly terrified of the
Shockingly, she turns and RUNS AWAY, and her feelings pour
This is a nightmare! I'm going to
fail and let everyone down! My
mother's going to pull me out of
Super Hero High and I'll never see
Then, WW shakes her head, trying to clear her mind.
No! This is all part of Lena's
trap. It isn't real. I just need to
Her EYES CLOSED, and terrified, she uses her LASSO ON HERSELF
to break the Yellow Kryptomites' spell and see the truth.
The truth is... I won't let anyone
down! I'll keep fighting! I am
strong, my mother's daughter, and I
will not give in to fear!!
As her "fear fever" breaks, WW gets a surge of energy. SHE'S
She PRESSES A BUTTON on her WRIST COMM and her INVISIBLE
MOTORCYCLE ZOOMS OUT of the Invisible jet.
Batgirl, BATARANGS in hand, GYMNASTIC TWIRLS UP into the
trees to dodge the swarming BLUE KRYPTOMITES!
One of them leaps into the air and HITS HER FOOT.
Immediately, Batgirl looks around in TOTAL CONFUSION.
Wait. Why am I in a tree again? Oh,
right, the K-mites. Wait. Do we say
ARE THEY?! I am SO confused!!
BEEP! BEEP! Supergirl, happily petting an Orange Kryptomite
like a kitty, looks at her wrist comm.
She hits a button. WW's and Batgirl's images pop up onscreen.
Kryptomites on me! When they touch
you, they affect your EMOTIONS! So
if you run into any, stay away!
How did you get this number?
What?! Supergirl, I-- Oh no. I'm
Wonder Woman is driving her cycle up the side of the pyramid!
She has Supergirl and Batgirl on her comm screen.
First I lost my mom, and now I've
lost my friends, too. I've got to
She REVS her cycle hard and reaches the TOP of the Pyramid!
The Lexcorp Generator PULSES with electro-magnetic energy. A
BEAM OF STATIC reaches into the SKY. Wonder Woman RIPS the
Generator out of place and it POWERS DOWN!
Batgirl HANGS by a tree, KICKING Kryptomites into the jungle.
Guys! You've got to fight these
ever met. Whenever I feel like my
life is chaos and confusion, you're
the one who helps me put the pieces
Supergirl absentmindedly and effortlessly twirls one of the
giant ancient stones over her head.
you place in me and all your
CLOSE ON Supergirl. She STOPS, thinks hard --
It's what friends do. Trust me when
I say that, if you ever get
confused in life, I will hold your
hand. If you ever lose your faith
in me, I HAVE FAITH IN YOU!
BATGIRL, suddenly focused, GRABS A VINE and SWINGS to her
Batjet - sailing safely over the Kryptomites below.
She takes off, heading straight for the glowing Aztec
monument. A BEAM OF STATIC reaches into the sky.
Batgirl narrows her focus and presses a button.
PFSZZZZZZZZ! Two Bat-claws on ropes SHOOT out of the jet and
CLANK CLANK - grab on to the generator.
The jet climbs and the ropes go taut as the generator RIPS
out of place and POWERS DOWN.
SUPERGIRL, determined, FLOATS UP above the Kryptomite swarm
and sees the Lexcorp Generator PULSING with electromagnetic
energy! She RIPS it out of place and it POWERS DOWN.
Thanks for the pep talk. Friend.
BEEP BEEEEEP! Batgirl checks her console.
Uh oh. Guys, I'm picking up a new
Batgirl studies readings on her wrist comm as they look out
The power spot must be OUT THERE
over the place, I can't get a lock.
Is it some kind of island?
You can't get a lock because the
Batgirl, Supergirl and WW RUSH to the Invisible Jet and TAKE
OFF for Themyscira -- deep in the middle of the ocean.
Our heroes emerge from the Invisible Jet to a small crowd of
Mother! I know what it looks like,
but I'm not here for Themyscira
WW stares at her Mother's hypnotic, blank eyes.
She notices that her mother, and all the Amazons, are holding
How do you know they're hypnotic?
ANGLE ON: a Purple Kryptomite with SWIRLY EYES that clearly
looks like it's out to hypnotize.
I'm guessing by the swirly eyes.
Batgirl and WW concentrate on Hippolyta, while our heroes are
slowly SURROUNDED by Amazons. ONLY SUPERGIRL NOTICES.
Lena must have cross-bred them with
We need to find Lena's generator
We don't want to hurt them! So...
Our heroes RUN down the beach, being chased by Amazons AND
I think I know where it is. The
most powerful part of the Island,
where we gather for combat and/or
She TAKES FLIGHT, followed quickly by Supergirl.
She POPS her WINGS open on her BACKPACK and JETS UPWARD,
leaving the Amazons and Kryptomites behind.
They reach the Battle Platform (a MARBLE SLAB, glowing just
like the other power points.) They LAND before the generator.
I was right! Here it is!
This one's bigger than the others.
I bet it's a fail-safe, designed to
power up automatically if the other
You don't think the fail-safe has a
Only one way to find out!
They PUSH with all their might on the hulking machine until
it TOPPLES OVER with a SPRAY OF SPARKS and POWERS DOWN.
There's no time to celebrate! My
Suddenly, Lena ZOOMS UP in her HOVERCRAFT to survey the scene
Aw, the backup generator TOO?! See,
this is why villains hate you guys.
And this is why I bought a little
ANGLE ON: ECLIPSO'S SHIP lands and transforms into the DARK
PALACE! Eclipso disembarks and saunters over.
So... did we enjoy the Hypnotic
Purple has always been my color...
Mine too! And green! Wait, what do
I mean my backup! In case your
WE SEE an EVEN BIGGER GENERATOR. Both "S.T.A.R. Labs" and
"LEXCORP" have been covered over with "ECLIPSO GENERATOR."
REALLY! It looks like I'll no
Eclipso holds up a copy of the CONTRACT she had with Lena. It
VANISHES in a puff of smoke.
Do you know how much it cost to get
Well, it's not like I was going to
let you rule the Earth anyway.
What do you care? You woulda been
read the fine print. I'm not
the Earth into a NEW GEMWORLD!
organic matrix and use it to
but, if you just have to dole out
She heads back to her palace.
And I really enjoyed it. Welp, I
gotta go, the Earth ain't gonna
DOOR SLAM! The palace TAKES OFF and disappears into the sky.
Well. We have to stop her!
I live by no code. Get over it.
Ohhh, of course! Well, now you're
Supergirl, how fast can you get us
Um... guys? I think we have another
They turn to see Bumblebee hovering towards them with BLANK,
Bumblebee hovers towards WW, Supergirl and Batgirl, her eyes
Kryptomites! We have to snap her
Bumblebee BLINKS her eyes back to normal.
I was trying to blend in. You know
what they say, when in Rome, act
When I dropped off your mom here,
Because, Lab Partner, we're a team!
Supergirl, you need to get us back
I'm not going with you. My mother
and our people are in danger.
Fine, so it's just us. When is this
ZIP! In a BLUR, Supergirl has snatched up Lena and Batgirl
and vanishes OS in a WHOOOOSH!
Eclipso's ship lands and transforms into the Dark Palace.
Eclipso looks out the window at her GIANT GENERATOR.
Start the generator! Direct ALL the
Purple Kryptomites work busily as Eclipso sits on her throne.
The door opens. Supergirl flies in carrying Lena and Batgirl.
Now I know what it's like to fly in
coach. You can put me down now!
Supergirl DROPS Lena, who lands on her butt.
Suddenly, the bunker begins to SHAKE and ROLL.
What! Did you build this place
Batgirl is already at the terminal, processing incoming data.
It's not just the bunker. The whole
Wait a minute, guys! I think this
is no coincidence. It may just be
WIDER to reveal Batgirl and Lena staring at her. Blinking.
Okay... now that we're all up to
speed. All I have to do is write a
Lena pushes Batgirl aside, so she has room to type at the
Which means you need someone who's
Fine. I'll work on the virus and
you work on opening the back door
Unsure what to do, Supergirl whips out her phone.
INSERT: SUPERGIRL'S SOCIAL NETWORK PAGE. It now reads:
- From SPACE, we see the EARTH SHAKE. Energy is radiating
from our planet to the MOON where a BEAM is shooting off into
- In VARIOUS pre-existing EARTH INTERIORS (like Super Hero
High), we see the effects of the EARTHQUAKES.
- In VARIOUS pre-existing EARTH EXTERIORS (also including
Super Hero High, etc.), we see STALAGMITES and CRYSTALLINE
Bumblebee and Wonder Woman JOSTLE VIOLENTLY as they dodge a
crystal stalagmite that explodes out of the ground.
Ahead of them, a group of Amazons, headed by mesmerized
Hippolyta, block their path. They are all armed with spears.
Wondy and Bee streak up into the air, where they must dodge a
volley of SPEARS thrown by the Amazons.
This one's going to be a lot
A swarm of swirly-eyed Purple Kryptomites flying in
KRYPTOMITE HELICOPTERS has cut them off in mid-air! What are
Lena and Batgirl are both typing furiously. It is a
competitive coding race! They glance furtively to make sure
they're each one step ahead of the other. Then...
She presses a button and her terminal flashes BLUE BLUE BLUE,
were supposed to open the backdoor!
Then what have you been doing??
Batgirl presses a few buttons and then pulls a small THUMB
DRIVE out of her computer and holds it up.
Then we'll have to do it in person.
In person?! Exactly which one of us
do you think can get to the moon
that fast and, ya know, survive?
The penny drops. They turn to look behind them at Supergirl,
who has a huge smile as she thumbs around on her phone.
INSERT: SUPERGIRL'S SOCIAL NETWORK PAGE. It now reads:
WW and Bumblebee soar through the air, but the K-mite
I gotta tell ya, Dub Dubs, this is
not how I thought it was gonna end!
It won't! We're not going to let
everyone down! I have a plan,
Eclipso giddily jumps between MONITOR SCREENS, watching
satellite photos of the Earth sprouting gems.
This is it! A new Gemworld for me
ANGLE ON the window behind her. We see Supergirl land at the
Then her screens REBOOT, now showing:
SUPERGIRL'S SOCIAL MEDIA PAGE! Her status now reads: "Just
uploaded virus into Doomsday Machine! YYYAAASSS!
She turns and looks through the window to see Supergirl
smiling at her. She waves and flies away revealing the
The generator goes DARK. The BEAM OF ENERGY at its tip
Bumblebee and Wonder Woman are flying toward a ROCK
stalagmites below that are RETRACTING into the ground.
In single file they race through a SMALL HOLE in a rock
formation. The K-Mite choppers won't fit through! So they
Bumblebee and Wonder Woman HIGH FIVE on the other side.
Now free of their choppers, a SWARM of K-Mites POUR through
the small hole in the rocks. They race toward the girls.
They girls take off flying in opposite directions. The K-Mite
swarm SPLITS IN TWO to follow!
ON WONDY - flying with K-mites in hot pursuit.
ON BEE - flying IN OPPOSITE DIRECTION w/ K-mites in pursuit.
WIDE - The girls SOAR TOWARD EACH OTHER. They're going to
CRASH! Then, at the last second, they turn SKYWARD. The
pursuing K-Mite groups CRASH INTO EACH OTHER!!
Close on K-Mites. Having touched one another, their SWIRLY
EYES go BLANK and hypnotic as they FREEZE in place!
ON HIPPOLYTA as her eyes go from GLAZED back to NORMAL. She
shakes off the K-Mite influence. PULL BACK to reveal ALL THE
AMAZONS return to normal. Include Bumblebee and Wondy.
Supergirl now flies in with Lena and Batgirl, again dropping
Lena to the ground as she lands.
Hippolyta looks at Batgirl, Supergirl and Bumblebee in
Thank you, girls. It appears I
free my people and save the world.
I think you're in the right place.
Wonder Woman and Hippolyta HUG. The other students and
Hey, but what about Eclipso? She's
still up there with all those
Oh... I don't think we'll be
hearing from her for a while...
Eclipso is on a tirade, barking orders at her Purple
Kryptomites. The K-Mites do not look happy.
You call yourself minions!? I bet
this thing back up and running
hours ago! I've a mind to throw you
The berated K-Mites have had ENOUGH. They look at one
Suddenly, they SWARM HER!! Eclipso is totally ENGULFED!
Her scream trails off as the K-Mites back away from her and
look on in satisfaction at her BLANK, HYPNOTIZED eyes.
She picks onee and PETS it like a kitty.
